column4: Hi, does anyone know a minimal install for 8.04.1-lpia, i.e. a Dell mini 9. I'll use them as thin cleints so i need a radically stripped down install. I have the repos, but no intaller
you want Ubuntu Netbook Remix - UNR
yes and no... i want the equivalent of a netinst .iso. i need complete control over what is installed, b/c i only need X, firefox  and rdesktop AND NOTHING ELSE
you can use the ubuntu alternate installer cd...that will give you control
